actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for the initiation of construction of the remaining features within the Wichita River Basin to reduce natural salt pollution.
short_title: Arkansas-Red River Basin, Texas, Oklahoma, and Kansas Water Resources Development Act

summary.text: Arkansas-Red River Basin, Texas, Oklahoma, and Kansas Water Resources Development Act - Modifies the project for water quality control in the Arkansas-Red River Basin in Kansas, Oklahoma, and Texas, to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to initiate construction of remaining project features designed to reduce natural salt pollution within the Wichita River Basin.

titles.title: Arkansas-Red River Basin, Texas, Oklahoma, and Kansas Water Resources Development Act
A bill to provide for the initiation of construction of the remaining features within the Wichita River Basin to reduce natural salt pollution.
